title: Disconnected during a ranked game
body:
I'm not sure if I won or lost because I still can't get internet on my computer. 

The situation is that while in a ranked game (and winning!!), I got disconnected. I tried the whole reset modem thing, but to no avail. Checking my provider's twitter, I've come to the conclusion that they are suffering outages. Out of my hand. 
Does Riot forgive this match? Or will I have to suck it up?

replies.body:
I am going to presume you finally got your internet back at this point, but in case you didn't, the game actually ended in a loss for you and your team, dropping you to 0 LP.  Given this doesn't appear to be a NA wide issue, the game wasn't loss forgiven :(

Wish I had better news!
